text: Tapas Paul (29 September 1958 – 18 February 2020) was an Indian actor and politician. He is known for acting in Dadar Kirti, Bhalobasa Bhalobasa, Anurager Choyan, Amar Bandhan, Guru Dakshina, Uttara and Mondo Meyer Upakhyan. Outside of acting, he served as an MLA (2001–2009) and an MP (2009–2019). Paul was born in Chandannagar, West Bengal. On 18 February 2020, he died due to cardiac arrest in Mumbai, Maharastra. He was 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian movie actors Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Trinamool Congress politicians
title: Tapas Paul
